infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: TigerFax uses your calendar to help schedule fax reminders and save important dates.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: TigerFax accesses your contacts to let you choose recipients quickly when sending faxes.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: TigerFax uses your camera to scan documents before sending a fax.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: TigerFax uses your location to improve delivery accuracy and help with regional compliance when sending faxes.
